alert.note: Alert for Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:58PM CDT until June 16 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTY... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Keownville, or 7 miles east of New Albany, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 346 PM CDT, quarter sized hail was reported in Keownville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Keownville, Union Hill, Wallerville, Branyan, Ellistown, Concord, Alpine, Jug Fork, Molino, Baker, Locum, Parks and Beacon Hill. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
